sitesYaml.title: Studenten bilden Schüler
sitesYaml.description: Studenten bilden Schüler e.V. is a German student-run nonprofit initiative that aims to contribute to more equal educational opportunities by providing free tutoring to refugees and children from underprivileged families. The site is built on Gatsby v2, styled-components and Contentful. It supports Google Analytics, fluid typography and Algolia search.
